name: Resting Ground
description:
Explore a mysterious place from a forgotten past.

Made in a week for the Godot Wild Jam # 30.

Controls

[AWSD] ... move
[MOUSE] ... look around
[E] ... use glow stick
[TAB] ... toggle directional microphone
[M] ... show map
[P] ... pause game
    
[F1] ... restart game
[F4] ... quit game

[F5] ... credits

Credits

A game by "fenchel" [@fenchel_]

Special thanks to "untitled"
